code: import React from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./Cursos.css';import{useFont}from'./context/ZoomContext';import curso1 from'../assets/curso1.jpeg';import curso2 from'../assets/curso2.jpeg';import curso3 from'../assets/curso3.jpeg';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Cursos=()=>{const navigate=useNavigate();const{fontSize}=useFont();const cursos=[{img:curso1,title:'Instalando aplicativos'},{img:curso2,title:'Descobrindo o Instagram'},{img:curso3,title:'Descobrindo o Whatsapp'}];const handleSubmit=(event,index)=>{event.preventDefault();navigate("/curso/".concat(index+1));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"config-container",style:{fontSize:"".concat(fontSize,"px")},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Central de ensino help idoso"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card-container",children:cursos.map((curso,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:curso.img,alt:curso.title,className:"card-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:curso.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"button",onClick:event=>handleSubmit(event,index),children:"Come\xE7ar"})]},index))})]});};export default Cursos;
